trait.name: Pounce
text: If the kavu moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the kavu can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The kavu makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.
